dialogue.text: That was fun, helped relieve a bit of that stress.
It sure was, the Nard!
Hey, what do you say about another ro-
NARD, WATCH OUT!
Nard steps out of the way, barely dodging a bullet flying towards the 4 of them.
Woah, that was close!
Well, well, well, look who found their way into my favorite hiding spot...
When he said it'd be easy to find you guys, I had no idea HOW easy he meant.
Neo, what are you doing here? I thought you left us ages ago.
Oh I did, but I'm back. Didn't receive my final paycheck so when I was offered blood money outta y'all...
I couldn't resist the temptation!
I go by Seven now by the way, Mr. Seven, that is...
Heh, that's funny, thought you'd never accept your surname.
Mr. Seven? What is that, your age? Because you sure are acting like a child.
Nathan, you're lucky you mean something to Charlie you know.
Since you're not the only one armed here, and I'm kinda being PAID to kill you and all...
Speaking of which, since I have to spare you, I just don't feel like one's enough...
I might just have to kill the midget as well, Mr. D never said what state I have to leave HIM in.
Only you Galaxii Brainlets and the girl...
Hold on now, there has to be some other way around this...
A rap battle, maybe?
Are you sure you still have it left in ya? You've rapped a lot in the last 12 hours...
GF I ain't becoming blood money, we winning this game or I'm dyin tryin'!
I like that enthusiasm! Let's do this!
Nathan crouches down and whispers something into The Boyfriend's ear.
I'm going to try and shoot him, you keep him distracted with the rap battle.
And be careful, my aim isn't that good.
